name: Santaphobia
description:
how to play:

to find out who is in your house you need to find some clues. Some are items in the house like cookies, christmas ball and salt for footprints. others are thing you need to observe like if the come from the chimney or the hall how many there are or if the give you are present or coleto

to check your clues of you can open your tablet with space and click on the cluse once for true twice for false

when you know what monster is in your hows you can go back to your bed and select it

pick up an item you hold E and to place it
